roll_up.name: Number of Male and Female Actors over the Years
roll_up.query: SELECT `year`, gender, count(gender) as gender_count FROM nwordtable WHERE year >= 1980 AND year <= 2000 GROUP BY `year`, gender with ROLLUP;
roll_up.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit, amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Soluta eligendi magnam dolores! Quis qui necessitatibus cum sapiente debitis, perferendis vero animi impedit dolor modi exercitationem facere tempora, illo quidem soluta!

slice.name: Number of Actors per Movie, in between the years 1980 to 2000 with a rating of 5 and up
slice.query: SELECT  s.year, COUNT(s.movie_id) as count, s.rank  FROM nwordtable s WHERE s.year >= '1980' AND s.year <= '2000' AND s.rank >= 5 AND s.rank <= 10 GROUP BY s.year, s.rank WITH ROLLUP;

pivot.name: Average Rank of Genres from 1980-2000
pivot.query: SELECT  DISTINCT s.genre, ROUND(AVG(s.rank), 2) AS `average_rank`, s.year FROM startable2 s WHERE s.year >= 1980 AND s.year <=2000 GROUP BY s.genre, s.year WITH ROLLUP;
